titleStmt.title: Philomela The Lady Fitzvvaters nightingale. By Robert Greene. Vtriusque Academiæ in Artibus magister.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By R. B[ourne and E. Allde] for Edward White, and are to be sold at the litle north dore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads "At London printed by E.A. for Edwarde VVhite .."; printers' names from STC; "Bourne pr[inted]. A-E".
Title page has device McKerrow 226 (motto "Il vostro .."). Variant: title page has device McKerrow 242 (motto "Ubique floret").
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the litle north dore of Paules
